byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The drugmaker had built itself into a $124 billion powerhouse in large part through repeated deals, for companies like Forest Laboratories.

headline.main: Allergan, in Shift From Buying Spree, Considers a Spin-Off

snippet: The drugmaker had built itself into a $124 billion powerhouse in large part through repeated deals, for companies like Forest Laboratories.
